section.title: Removing a CPU Quality of Service Entry
section.para: Remove an existing CPU quality of service entry.

procedure.title: Removing a CPU Quality of Service Entry

step.para: Click the Data Centers resource tab and select a data center.
Click QoS in the details pane.
Select the CPU quality of service entry to remove.

section.para: You have removed the CPU quality of service entry, and that entry is no longer available. If any CPU profiles were based on that entry, the CPU quality of service entry for those profiles is automatically set to [unlimited].
